plot: A normal morning in the life of a man and his wife in Germany, 1930. While the wife is setting the table, the man shave his beard and after the breakfast he drives to his company.
title: Morgenstunde hat Gold im Munde
plot_es: A normal morning in the life of a man and his wife in Germany, 1930. While the wife is setting the table, the man shave his beard and after the breakfast he drives to his company.
plot_en: A normal morning in the life of a man and his wife in Germany, 1930. While the wife is setting the table, the man shave his beard and after the breakfast he drives to his company.
